CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Rural Communities relative to Families?
SRP.A: Rural Communities is {below} Families in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Working Professionals relative to Families?
SRP.A: Working Professionals is {below} Families in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Students relative to Urban Dwellers?
SRP.A: Students is {above} Urban Dwellers in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total technology adoption rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Urban Dwellers}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total technology adoption rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Working Professionals}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Young Adults's maximum Technology Adoption Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Young Adults's maximum Technology Adoption Rate is in {1997}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Working Professionals's minimum Technology Adoption Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Working Professionals's minimum Technology Adoption Rate is in {1986}.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1991, was the average total Technology Adoption Rate higher or lower than between 1985 and 1994?
NC.A: The average total technology adoption rate between 1978 and 1991 was {lower} than between 1985 and 1994.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1981, did the total Technology Adoption Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1987 and 1992?
NC.A: The change in total technology adoption rate between 1980 and 1981 was {larger} than between 1987 and 1992.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1973, did the total Technology Adoption Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1973 and 1986?
NC.A: The change in total technology adoption rate between 1971 and 1973 was {smaller} than between 1973 and 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1996, did the total Technology Adoption Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1974 and 1997?
NC.A: The change in total technology adoption rate between 1976 and 1996 was {larger} than between 1974 and 1997.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Rural Communities} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Rural Communities and Urban Dwellers first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Rural Communities and Urban Dwellers first exchanged leading positions in {1971}.
